title: Productivity and Success for the Business-Minded
headline: Learn top productivity techniques, factors that lead to business success and things to avoid in our free online course.
description: If you are an entrepreneur wanting a start-up company or small business, your chances of success are slim. This reality is why you need to learn from those before you. Your instructor has many years of experience and will guide you through this process, using his mistakes and stories to help you succeed. You will start by exploring productivity solutions, getting general tips for success and seeing what to avoid in this free online course.
courseDescription:
Are you struggling with productivity while running your business? Have you made some mistakes in your company that you could have avoided? This course will help you 'right the ship' and arrange the proper processes. You will start by learning about various productivity tips, from meditation to cutting down on drinking. After that, you'll get some general information on factors that lead to success. For example, does dressing well matter or not? Following this, you'll study the elements that make a successful entrepreneur and gain other general tips.

The following section discusses the instructor's complicated past and how that led first to debt but ultimately helped him succeed. Next, he illustrates how a famous idiom 'the grass is always greener on the other side' is often accurate in the entrepreneurship journey. Appreciate another truth of entrepreneurship through an ice cube and temperature change analogy.

In the final section, you begin exploring common financial mistakes and how to avoid them. Discover the numerous ways to make money from home. Finally, you will get some great advice on how to go about finding a mentor. Entrepreneurship has become 'the latest thing' but is it for you? And do you know what to avoid on your journey? Perhaps you've made these same mistakes or maybe this course will prevent you from making identical errors. Take our free online course and discover the path to business success.
